attributes.action: regulate financial markets to ensure universal efficiency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Capitalist finance is built on the point of efficient markets. That requires equal access to trading information and response times for all.
You shouldn't in principle lay off your trading to your dealing experts to get themselves bonuses to do the best for yourself. That is entirely against the justification of capitalism for market efficiency.
As much as a universal post office - say we require a universal trading application for anything you can legally trade, within parameters. It needs to be available to everyone on say their mobile phone to be ok.
